# skills.ws

> Agent skills for AI coding assistants. Install with npx skills-ws.

skills.ws provides SKILL.md files that give AI coding assistants specialized knowledge — workflows, checklists, code patterns, and domain expertise. Drop them into your project and your AI gets smarter.

## Skills (60)

### Marketing
- [seo-geo](https://skills.ws/skills/seo-geo): SEO & GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) for websites. Optimize for AI search engines and traditional search.
- [content-strategy](https://skills.ws/skills/content-strategy): Plan content strategy, decide what to create, figure out what topics to cover for SaaS and software products.
- [copywriting](https://skills.ws/skills/copywriting): Write, rewrite, or improve marketing copy for any page — homepage, landing, pricing, feature, about, or product pages.
- [email-sequence](https://skills.ws/skills/email-sequence): Create or optimize email sequences, drip campaigns, automated flows, and lifecycle email programs.
- [paid-ads](https://skills.ws/skills/paid-ads): Paid advertising campaigns on Google Ads, Meta, LinkedIn, Twitter/X. Strategy, copy, targeting, optimization.
- [programmatic-seo](https://skills.ws/skills/programmatic-seo): Create SEO-driven pages at scale using templates and data. Directory pages, location pages, comparison pages.
- [growth-hacking](https://skills.ws/skills/growth-hacking): Growth hacking strategies and tactics. Viral loops, referral programs, activation funnels, retention hooks.
- [local-seo](https://skills.ws/skills/local-seo): Local SEO optimization. Google Business Profile, local citations, reviews, location pages, map pack ranking.
- [marketing-analytics](https://skills.ws/skills/marketing-analytics): Marketing analytics setup and optimization. GA4, attribution, dashboards, KPIs, funnel analysis.
- [social-media-kit](https://skills.ws/skills/social-media-kit): Create social media content kits. Platform-specific posts, hashtag strategies, content calendars, engagement tactics.
- [blog-engine](https://skills.ws/skills/blog-engine): End-to-end blog post creation pipeline: research, outline, draft, SEO optimize, publish-ready. Headline formulas, intro hooks, CTA patterns, internal linking, featured snippet optimization.
- [pr-media-outreach](https://skills.ws/skills/pr-media-outreach): End-to-end PR and media outreach playbook covering press releases, journalist pitching, crisis comms, and PR measurement.
- [webinar-events](https://skills.ws/skills/webinar-events): End-to-end webinar funnel design from registration through conversion, including virtual event strategy, email sequences, and content repurposing.
- [influencer-marketing](https://skills.ws/skills/influencer-marketing): Complete influencer marketing playbook covering identification, outreach, contracts, compliance, and ROI measurement across platforms.
- [brand-strategy](https://skills.ws/skills/brand-strategy): Brand positioning, messaging hierarchy, visual identity, and brand architecture frameworks for building and managing a cohesive brand system.

### Conversion
- [page-cro](https://skills.ws/skills/page-cro): Optimize, improve, or increase conversions on any marketing page — homepage, landing, pricing, feature pages.
- [signup-flow-cro](https://skills.ws/skills/signup-flow-cro): Optimize signup, registration, account creation, or trial activation flows for higher conversion.
- [popup-cro](https://skills.ws/skills/popup-cro): Create or optimize popups, modals, overlays, slide-ins, and banners for conversion. Exit intent, lead capture, announcements.
- [lead-scoring](https://skills.ws/skills/lead-scoring): Design and implement lead scoring models. Qualify leads based on behavior, demographics, and engagement.
- [crm-builder](https://skills.ws/skills/crm-builder): Design and implement CRM workflows. Pipeline management, automation, lead nurturing, deal tracking.
- [sales-funnel](https://skills.ws/skills/sales-funnel): Design and optimize sales funnels. TOFU/MOFU/BOFU content, qualification stages, conversion paths.
- [ab-testing](https://skills.ws/skills/ab-testing): A/B test design, statistical analysis, sample size calculation, experiment prioritization, and results interpretation.
- [pricing-optimization](https://skills.ws/skills/pricing-optimization): Price testing, value metric selection, packaging strategy, discount frameworks, and willingness-to-pay research.

### Design
- [landing-page-builder](https://skills.ws/skills/landing-page-builder): Build high-converting landing pages from scratch. Copy, layout, CTAs, social proof, and responsive design.
- [ascii-banner](https://skills.ws/skills/ascii-banner): Build animated ASCII banners for CLI tools and web interfaces. Frame-based animation, ANSI color systems, terminal compatibility, accessibility, and web-based ASCII shaders.
- [ui-ux-pro-max](https://skills.ws/skills/ui-ux-pro-max): UI/UX design intelligence. Style guides, color palettes, font pairings, component patterns, accessibility audit (WCAG 2.1 AA), responsive design patterns.

### Web3
- [smart-contract-auditor](https://skills.ws/skills/smart-contract-auditor): Audit Solidity smart contracts for vulnerabilities, gas optimization, and best practices.

### Growth
- [business-development](https://skills.ws/skills/business-development): BD strategy, partnership frameworks, outreach templates, deal pipeline management, and negotiation playbooks for B2B SaaS.
- [cold-outreach](https://skills.ws/skills/cold-outreach): Cold email and LinkedIn outreach. Personalization frameworks, follow-up sequences, deliverability, and reply rate optimization.
- [social-media-growth](https://skills.ws/skills/social-media-growth): Platform-specific growth tactics. Algorithmic optimization, engagement hacking, viral mechanics, and community building at scale.
- [competitor-intelligence](https://skills.ws/skills/competitor-intelligence): Competitive analysis frameworks, market positioning, feature comparison matrices, and win/loss analysis for strategic planning.
- [affiliate-marketing](https://skills.ws/skills/affiliate-marketing): Affiliate program design, commission structures, partner recruitment, tracking implementation, and performance optimization.
- [customer-acquisition](https://skills.ws/skills/customer-acquisition): CAC optimization, channel mix modeling, attribution analysis, and acquisition strategy for paid and organic channels.
- [community-building](https://skills.ws/skills/community-building): Playbook for building, growing, and sustaining online communities from zero to 10,000+ members with engagement frameworks and metrics.
- [customer-feedback](https://skills.ws/skills/customer-feedback): Design and operate a Voice of Customer program — from NPS/CSAT collection through qualitative analysis to roadmap integration.

### Operations
- [accounting-finance](https://skills.ws/skills/accounting-finance): Financial modeling, bookkeeping automation, invoicing workflows, tax compliance checklists, and P&L analysis for SMEs and startups.
- [crm-operations](https://skills.ws/skills/crm-operations): CRM setup, pipeline automation, lead routing, deal tracking, and operational workflows for HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive.
- [revenue-operations](https://skills.ws/skills/revenue-operations): RevOps frameworks, funnel metrics, forecasting models, GTM alignment, and operational efficiency for scaling teams.
- [eu-legal-compliance](https://skills.ws/skills/eu-legal-compliance): Navigate GDPR, DSA, DMA, EU AI Act, NIS2, and consumer protection — with specific article references, deadlines, and penalties.
- [hiring-team-building](https://skills.ws/skills/hiring-team-building): Hire, onboard, and build high-performing teams in the EU — covering labor law, structured interviews, remote work regulations, and team design.
- [project-management](https://skills.ws/skills/project-management): End-to-end project management frameworks covering sprint planning, OKRs, stakeholder management, risk mitigation, and retrospectives.

### Analytics
- [data-analytics](https://skills.ws/skills/data-analytics): Data analysis workflows, SQL query patterns, dashboard design, KPI frameworks, and data storytelling for business intelligence.
- [data-management](https://skills.ws/skills/data-management): Data governance, pipeline design, ETL workflows, data quality frameworks, and warehouse architecture for growing teams.
- [google-analytics](https://skills.ws/skills/google-analytics): GA4 setup, event taxonomy, custom dimensions, conversion tracking, audience segments, and reporting automation.
- [search-console](https://skills.ws/skills/search-console): Google Search Console optimization. Index coverage, performance analysis, sitemap management, and search appearance debugging.
- [bing-webmaster](https://skills.ws/skills/bing-webmaster): Bing Webmaster Tools setup, IndexNow protocol, URL submission, backlink analysis, and Bing-specific SEO optimization.
- [yandex-webmaster](https://skills.ws/skills/yandex-webmaster): Yandex Webmaster setup, Yandex-specific SEO, regional targeting, Turbo pages, and Russian market search optimization.
- [retention-analytics](https://skills.ws/skills/retention-analytics): Churn analysis, cohort retention, engagement scoring, health scoring, and win-back strategies for SaaS products.

### Dev
- [virustotal](https://skills.ws/skills/virustotal): URL, file, domain, and IP scanning via VirusTotal CLI and API. Threat detection, reputation checks, malware analysis, phishing detection.
- [git-workflow](https://skills.ws/skills/git-workflow): Branching strategies, commit conventions, code review, and release workflows for professional teams.
- [cicd-pipelines](https://skills.ws/skills/cicd-pipelines): Production-grade CI/CD with GitHub Actions, deployment strategies, caching, and release automation.
- [api-design](https://skills.ws/skills/api-design): REST, GraphQL, and OpenAPI design patterns with auth, error handling, versioning, and webhook best practices.
- [database-design](https://skills.ws/skills/database-design): Schema design, indexing, migrations, query optimization, and PostgreSQL patterns for production systems.
- [testing-strategy](https://skills.ws/skills/testing-strategy): Testing pyramid, framework selection, mocking patterns, CI integration, and flaky test management for production codebases.
- [web-performance](https://skills.ws/skills/web-performance): Core Web Vitals optimization, bundle analysis, caching strategies, and server-side performance for modern web applications.
- [security-hardening](https://skills.ws/skills/security-hardening): Comprehensive web application security hardening covering OWASP Top 10, secure headers, authentication, and dependency auditing.
- [prompt-engineering](https://skills.ws/skills/prompt-engineering): Patterns and techniques for designing, evaluating, and optimizing LLM prompts across models and use cases.
- [ai-agent-design](https://skills.ws/skills/ai-agent-design): Architecture patterns, tool design, memory systems, and deployment strategies for building reliable AI agents.
- [mvp-launcher](https://skills.ws/skills/mvp-launcher): Ship MVPs fast: validation frameworks, scoping, build-vs-buy decisions, 3-week sprint plans, launch checklists, and post-launch playbooks.
- [nextjs-stack](https://skills.ws/skills/nextjs-stack): Opinionated full-stack Next.js blueprint: App Router, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, Prisma, Postgres, Stripe, auth, and deployment.

## Links
- Website: https://skills.ws
- Install: npx skills-ws
- GitHub: https://github.com/san-npm/skills-ws
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/skills-ws
